tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(100),
    email_address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    purchase_history JSON,
    preferences JSON
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    preference_name VARCHAR(50),
    preference_value VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    preference_type TEXT,
    preference_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PurchaseHistory (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_name TEXT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketingCampaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    campaign_type TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 email VARCHAR(255),
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_id INT,
 category VARCHAR(50),
 preference_value VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_id INT,
 product_id INT,
 purchase_date DATE,
 price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 category VARCHAR(50),
 price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 budget DECIMAL(15, 2)
)
